an5.191:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, porana brahmanadhamma etarahi sunakhesu sandissanti, no brahmanesu.
an5.191:1.3: Pubbe sudam, bhikkhave, brahmana brahmanimyeva gacchanti, no abrahmanim.
an5.191:1.4: Etarahi, bhikkhave, brahmana brahmanimpi gacchanti, abrahmanimpi gacchanti.
an5.191:1.5: Etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakha sunakhimyeva gacchanti, no asunakhim.
an5.191:1.6: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo porano brahmanadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no brahmanesu.
an5.191:2.1: Pubbe sudam, bhikkhave, brahmana brahmanim utunimyeva gacchanti, no anutunim.
an5.191:2.2: Etarahi, bhikkhave, brahmana brahmanim utunimpi gacchanti, anutunimpi gacchanti.
an5.191:2.3: Etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakha sunakhim utunimyeva gacchanti, no anutunim.
an5.191:2.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo porano brahmanadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no brahmanesu.
an5.191:3.1: Pubbe sudam, bhikkhave, brahmana brahmanim neva kinanti no vikkinanti, sampiyeneva samvasam sambandhaya sampavattenti.
an5.191:3.2: Etarahi, bhikkhave, brahmana brahmanim kinantipi vikkinantipi, sampiyenapi samvasam sambandhaya sampavattenti.
an5.191:3.3: Etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakha sunakhim neva kinanti no vikkinanti, sampiyeneva samvasam sambandhaya sampavattenti.
an5.191:3.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo porano brahmanadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no brahmanesu.
an5.191:4.1: Pubbe sudam, bhikkhave, brahmana na sannidhim karonti dhanassapi dhannassapi rajatassapi jatarupassapi.
an5.191:4.2: Etarahi, bhikkhave, brahmana sannidhim karonti dhanassapi dhannassapi rajatassapi jatarupassapi.
an5.191:4.3: Etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakha na sannidhim karonti dhanassapi dhannassapi rajatassapi jatarupassapi.
an5.191:4.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho porano brahmanadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no brahmanesu.
an5.191:5.1: Pubbe sudam, bhikkhave, brahmana sayam sayamasaya pato patarasaya bhikkham pariyesanti.
an5.191:5.2: Etarahi, bhikkhave, brahmana yavadattham udaravadehakam bhunjitva avasesam adaya pakkamanti.
an5.191:5.3: Etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakha sayam sayamasaya pato patarasaya bhikkham pariyesanti.
an5.191:5.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo porano brahmanadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no brahmanesu.
an5.191:5.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca porana brahmanadhamma etarahi sunakhesu sandissanti, no brahmanesu”ti.
